title: Week 17 Recap, Coaching Carousel & Who's Equipped For The Playoffs (Football 12/31)
description:
Nick Kostos and Pete Prisco review the last week of the regular season, what coaches have already been fired and what the playoffs mean for the teams that are in. First, the guys break down what coaches have already been canned and what's looming on Black Monday. Then, they break down who's in and who's out of this year's playoffs, who the contenders and pretenders are and the guys foreshadow their playoff picks. Finally, the guys wrap up the final week of the NFL regular season and what the future holds for many teams.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
